attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the current information released to the public,we request that the term "Honourable" no longer applies to MP's and therefore should be formally deleted from their titles.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
